main.name: Guessous Saad
main.bio: I’m Saad, a random guy enjoying building cool stuff and learning fast. Currently a Computer Science student at ENSEEIHT, I’m passionate about AI/DL, robotics, and tech in general. Above all, I'm obsessed with the startup world: turning ideas into products, exploring problems worth solving, and figuring out how to create real value

education.description: Intensive undergraduate program in Mathematics and Physics, preparing for national competitive exams

education.degree: MSc in Computer Science & Software Engineering
education.description: Specializing in AI and Software Systems. Top-tier French Engineering School

projects.title: QuickRAG
projects.about: An open-source toolkit for Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with advanced techniques like : Colbert and  Rerankers .It combines document indexing, retrieval, optional reranking, and querying large language models (LLMs) like Gemini.

projects.title: ViT from scratch
projects.about: A minimalist, from-scratch implementation of the Vision Transformer (ViT) using PyTorch. Its purpose is to provide a clean, modular view of the ViT's core components for educational and deep understanding.

projects.title: Transformer from scratch
projects.about: Implemenation of a Transformer model from scratch using PyTorch, following the architecture introduced in the paper : Attention is all you need

projects.title: LoRA fine-tuning in a medical dataset
projects.about: Fine-tuned a BERT model on a medical dataset using LoRA and quantization. The model predicts illnesses based on patient symptoms and provides explanations for its reasoning

projects.title: Launched an AI-driven automation startup
projects.about: Founded an automation startup leveraging AI to streamline workflows

testimonials.text: Alex's technical expertise and problem-solving abilities are outstanding. They transformed our entire infrastructure and reduced costs by 40%.
Working with Alex was a game-changer for our team. Their code quality and architectural decisions set new standards for our organization.
